review: My Fire TV Stick stopped working after 9 months.  Amazon quickly replaced it with a refurbished one.  I haven't had the refurbished one long, but so far it's working fine.  I like the Fire TV Stick much better than Apple TV.

review: It worked just fine the first day, but the next day, it kept taking me back to reconnect to my network. It refuses to reconnect no matter how many times I try, even though it states there is a very good connection and my android app sees the stick on the network, just will not connect. I've reset it, unplugged it...etc. There are a lot of negative reviews for this issue and seems like there have been no updates and it is still not working for many people, myself included. I will be returning this and I will not be recommending this product to anyone.Totally disappointed as I was very happy day 1...
author: Christie Ryan

review: Easy set up.  Arrived on timeAs usual with prime.  Fantastic benefits if you already have prime. Lots of shows and movies to choose from.
author: M C

review: This device has a glitch in it that does not allow you to set parental controls. This leaves your kids vulnerable to any content and it leaves your Amazon account vulnerable to unauthorized purchases. And Amazon will say "screw you; it is your fault'" when it happens. I have owned it since it came out. Listen to someone that has used it for awhile not people who write reviews out of the box. I have owned Rokus and never had this problem. There are more apps on the Roku, the interface is more intuitive...do not waste your time.
author: MJ
